CustomField.description:
Used on Approval Request screens as a workaround to this known issue: https://issues.salesforce.com/issue/a028c00000qQ2VPAA0/business-account-name-will-not-display-on-the-approval-detail-page-layout-for-business-accounts-when-person-accounts-is-enabled
Can be removed once issue has been resolved.
CustomField.label: Account
